title: Pixel 4a Overheating: Are others facing similar overheating issues in Pixel 4a? How did you resolve?
content:
The issue I am facing regarding overheating is as explained by multiple blog posts online including the community support (https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/76850309?hl=en&msgid=76850309) where people have quoted it.
Google is delaying the decision on replacing my device and it has been with the service team for the past 20 days.
I want to understand how others have resolved this issue in the past - with other Pixels / Pixel 4a specifically.
Issue with my device - overheating to the level that it concerns personal safety:
Overheating even on regular usage (browse, YouTube, read articles)
Heating to an extent that phone cannot be held against the ear to take regular calls
Battery drain upon overheating
Camera/Flash does not function upon overheating
